synopsis.text: Kuramochi Jun, the Aviation Club captain, sees an opportunity when the volleyball-loving Tamaki Tsuru accidentally damages a glider during her university club tryouts. Hoping to leave her athletic past behind and experience a typical university life filled with romance, Tamaki is reluctantly drawn into the world of gliding to repay her debt. As she works for the Aviation Club, Kuramochi takes her on a flight that reveals the breathtaking beauty of the skies, captivating Tamaki and forever changing her college life.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
